Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and identify microbial pathogen nucleic acids in cerebrospinal fluid
Methodologies: Sample preparation and automated nucleic acid extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for QIAstat-Dx Meningitis/Encephalitis (ME) Panel, a multiplexed real-time PCR panel for simultaneous qualitative detection of bacterial, viral, and yeast nucleic acids in cerebrospinal fluid
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex real-time PCR panel for simultaneous detection and identification of multiple bacterial, viral, and yeast nucleic acids from CSF specimens to aid in diagnosis of meningitis and/or encephalitis; for use with QIAstat-Dx Analyzer 1.0 and in conjunction with clinical, epidemiological, and laboratory data
